Tucson nodds.  

"Of Course, good choice Leo.  All right, let's go and meet=
 the trio.  Don't worry, I definitely know how I'm going to handle them.  I=
 see a lot of old history repeating itself.  Brings back a lot of memories =
of my rookie days."

He opens the door to the med bay.

"After you."

OOC: =
I will now create the thread at the Ready Room.  Look for "Lessons to be Le=
arned."  That will include how Rattrap, Straight Shot and Wheelie will work=
 together as a trio to try and learn a valuable lesson about teamwork. 

--=
